[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@liquidrazor/list-display](./list-display.md) &gt; [FieldFilterConfig](./list-display.fieldfilterconfig.md) &gt; [options](./list-display.fieldfilterconfig.options.md)

## FieldFilterConfig.options property

Optional list of static options (for select / multiSelect).

**Signature:**

```typescript
options?: FilterOption[];
```

## Remarks

When provided, these options will be presented to the user for selection. Each option contains a value and a human-readable label. [FilterOption](./list-display.filteroption.md)
